Sentencas: CaMnO3-based ceramics have been the subject of considerable research due to their potential application in solid oxide fuel cells, thermoelectric generators, and catalysis.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: The computational modeling technique based on the classical pair-wise potentials has allowed atomic-scale insights into the defect chemistry, diffusion of Ca2+ and O2- ions, and solution of various dopants in this material.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: The Ca/Mn anti-site was found to be the most favorable intrinsic defect suggesting disorder, which would be sensitive to synthesis conditions.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: The second most favorable disorder in CaMnO3 involves loss of CaO, resulting in calcium and oxygen vacancies, which in turn can promote vacancy mediated self-diffusion.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: The activation energy for oxygen migration (1.25 eV) is much lower than that for calcium (4.42 eV).
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: Favorable isovalent dopants on the Ca and Mn sites were found to be Fe2+ and Ge4+, respectively.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: The formation of O vacancies can be facilitated by doping of single dopants Fe2+ and Al3+ on the Mn site.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3

Sentencas: Dual dopants Ni-Fe and Al-Ga on the Mn site can also facilitate the introduction of oxygen vacancies required for the vacancy assisted oxygen diffusion.
Titulo: Defect and dopant properties in CaMnO3
